guidance.guidance_text:
The principles of life-cycle costing for construction are set out in the International Standard ISO 15686-5 Buildings and constructed assets. Service life planning. Life-cycle costing. Where available, projects may use national implementations of ISO 15686-5.

Having carried out a study, additional credits may follow from appropriate design or specification to allow for efficient or reduced levels of maintenance, and for ease of deconstruction and recycling at the end of life. These aspects are assessed in Resources.
